name: Leaf
description: LeafFilter provides professionally installed gutter protection systems plus gutter installation, replacement, and cleaning services to help keep gutters clog-free and protect homes from water damage.
services: LeafFilter gutter protection (gutter guard) system installation
Gutter installation & replacement services (including custom seamless gutters)
callPurposes: Schedule free estimates for LeafFilter gutter protection, gutter installation/replacement, or gutter cleaning
Answer product, pricing, and installation questions and route to sales or scheduling
Support existing customers (service/repair, warranty/registration, billing, escalation) and triage spam/wrong numbers

transferReasons.sales: New or prospective customers seeking pricing, product info, or to start a new project/estimate
transferReasons.estimate-scheduling: Schedule, confirm, reschedule, or cancel a free in-home estimate appointment
transferReasons.installation-scheduling: Schedule, confirm, reschedule, or questions about an installation already ordered or in progress
transferReasons.service-repair: Post-installation service or repair issues (leaks, clogs, performance problems, refund requests)
transferReasons.billing: Charges, payments, refunds, invoices, or account balance questions
transferReasons.general: General office, job inquiries, vendors, or requests not fitting other categories
transferReasons.escalation: Caller demands a supervisor, is upset, or needs urgent human assistance
transferReasons.warranty-registration: Warranty registration or general warranty questions without active performance issues

leadCriteria: Caller expresses interest in LeafFilter gutter protection or gutter installation/replacement
Property owner/decision-maker with gutters at a serviceable address
Provides valid contact info (name, phone, and address/ZIP)
Requests or agrees to a free estimate timeframe
primaryService: free estimate for LeafFilter gutter protection
